name: Calyxia677630
description: Calyxia iterates over a grid, centred on zero, using a periodic mathematical function to generate glitchy, repetitive loops. Resolution is intentionally limited to introduce interference effects, further enhanced with slight rotation and post-rendering effects. A seed value is used to create many of the parameters, in this case 677630. A 720x720 pixel version is available as a single edition.
